heroPopupAC.title: Events
heroPopupAC.text:
Control the outcome...
 Send the creator a bid with what you want them to do, how much you’d spend, then watch them do the bid!

heroPopupMC.title: Superpolls
heroPopupMC.text:
The creator makes a poll you pay to vote on.
 When the time’s up, watch the creator do the option that got the most amount of votes!

heroPopupCF.title: Goals
heroPopupCF.text: Pool money with others to back goals made by your favorite creators. If enough people back the goal, you’ll watch the creator do it!

timer.title: Countdown
timer.text: When time’s up, the creator picks their favorite bid and posts a video doing the bid.
